entry.title: WIND WARNING , Willow Creek (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:06 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Claresholm 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: 5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 47 %
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: WSW 40 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 90 in wind prone areas. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:54 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
